reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Great professor, explains concepts clearly and is very approachable.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Amazing teacher! Her lectures are well-organized and easy to follow.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: The class was tough, but he knows his stuff. Be prepared to study hard.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Lectures can be boring, and the material is not well-organized.

reviews.review: Very enthusiastic about the subject and makes the lectures interesting.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Good professor, but the exams are a bit challenging.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Decent professor, but sometimes hard to follow.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Engaging lecturer with real-world examples that make the material relatable.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Excellent professor, very knowledgeable and passionate about literature.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: The lectures are too abstract, and the grading is harsh.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Interesting topics, but sometimes difficult to stay engaged.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Good professor, provides great insights into the art world.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Fantastic professor, makes complex topics easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: The material is very technical, and the lectures can be dry.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable and approachable, but sometimes speaks too fast.

reviews.review: Incredibly interesting lectures, and the professor is very engaging.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Great professor, but the workload is heavy.

reviews.review: Good professor, but the grading is very strict.
